email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a client looking to ship 50,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment? The preferred incoterm is CFR.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN QUEEN, DWT 85,000, LOA 250m, for this shipment. The laycan is 20-25 October 2023.

Our starting freight rate is USD 25/MT on a CFR basis. Demurrage is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this works for your client.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quick response. My client finds the rate a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering the freight rate to USD 22/MT? Also, can you confirm the vessel's availability for the revised laycan of 22-27 October?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

I understand your client's concerns. After consulting with the owners, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 23/MT. The vessel MV OCEAN QUEEN is still available for the revised laycan of 22-27 October.

Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the fixture.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. My client agrees to the freight rate of USD 23/MT and the laycan of 22-27 October. Please send over the recap for final confirmation.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Great news! Recap attached for your review and confirmation.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarão
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN QUEEN
Freight: USD 23/MT
Laycan: 22-27 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Thank you for the business!

Best regards,
Emily
